name: Blocks;
description:
A simple game about avoiding blocks.

===========================================================

- Controls -

Movement:

 ( A/D or Left/Right Arrows )

===========================================================

The difficulty continuously rises along with the score until you lose.

There are 3 types of Power UP:

  • Speed Boost
  • Invisibility
  • Slow-Motion

It depends fully on beating your own HIGHSCORE (mine is 104, try beating this if you like and write a comment with a screenshot of it).

This is my first game in Unity so i'm sorry if you find any bug. I'll try and fix any bug that people may found.

I made this with the intension to make it more like a timekiller than a game with a "Meaning" if you catch me ;)

Download & Install Steps:

  • Download .rar file
  • Place in a folder on you desktop
  • Right click > Extract Here
  • Double click on tsola.exe
  • Hope you Enjoy!

Thank you for checking it out!
